"Ah, <%me>.": "Hey, partner. I just ran into Matoi. We're chatting about old times, wanna join us?"
"Hehe. It really takes me back, being around you two like this."
"So much has happened already, hard to believe it's only been three years since we first joined."
"Even still, it feels like it was just yesterday that the two of you rescued me."
"After that, everything that happened with Xion and myself... Yes, I remember it all so well."
"I joined ARKS to look for my sister, and got caught up in all sorts of things... It sure was one heck of a ride."
"Yuki turned out to be a Dark Falz, and you two almost succumbed to it too..."
"...You know putting everything together like that, I almost feel like I'm some kinda jinx or something."
"O-of course you're not! Yucreta came back to us, after all!"
"Yeah. Thanks to <%me> here."
"The same goes for me. Because of you, <%me>, I am still here today."
"We're still missing someone"
"It was thanks to everyone working together"
"...You're right. This still isn't over."
"...I feel the same way, <%me>. We definitely need to save them."
"Don't sell yourself short. We owe you a lot for all the things you've done."
"That's why, I wanna do everything I can to help you out. Even if I'm not all that useful."
"Still, the two of us joined at the same time, but now we're in totally different positions."
"There's you, one of only two Guardians in the entirety of ARKS. Then there's me, just a normal everyday member."
"...Our titles might have changed, but the three of us are just the same as back then. The memories we have of our time together will never disappear."
"Ah, speaking of memories... Do you remember the time I performed a song?"
"Ohh, you mean that time Casra tricked you into doing that whole thing!"
"You weren't in ARKS yet then, were you Matoi?"
"No, I wasn't. I was still undergoing all of those tests and examinations to make sure I was fit to join."
"<%me>. That was such an interesting event. Everyone had all gathered together in one place."
"Theodore's singing sure was something. We should go \"remind\" him about it sometime, partner."
